title: TMGW #139: Grace and Mamrie on Smoking Toads
description:
This week Grace and Mamrie discuss Demolition Derby, Mac and Cheese, Dolly Parton and the Pros and Cons of Olympic Village.

Go to http://candidco.com/tmgw and use code TMGW to get $75 off your Candid starter kit.

For a limited time, get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more when you download the DoorDash app and enter code TMGW2021.

Go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code getweird to get $20 off a minimum purchase of $100.

Go to http://bombas.com-/tmgw to get 20% off your first order.
